links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (11, -45, 95, -115, 81, -31, 5).
mathematica: lst={}; Do[AppendTo[lst,5^n-n^5],{n,0,5!}]; lst (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Jan 15 2009 *)Table[5^n-n^5,{n,0,20}] (* or *) LinearRecurrence[{11,-45,95,-115,81,-31,5},{1,4,-7,-118,-399,0,7849},30] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Oct 15 2014 *)
prog: (MAGMA) [5^n-n^5: n in [0..30]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, May 14 2011(PARI) a(n)=5^n-n^5 \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Oct 07 2015
